definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: I don't like electricity，but I'm interested in the law of universal gravitation.
sentences.chinese: 我討厭電學，但我對萬有引力定律感興趣。

sentences.english: The discovery was foreseen more than 150 years ago by Michael Faraday, the father of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 電學之父法拉第早到150年前就預見了這個發現。

sentences.english: Electrostatics is currently being used for separation of minerals, for paint spraying , and for dry coating applications.
sentences.chinese: 靜電學目前正被應用於礦物分離噴漆和幹法塗料。

sentences.english: The problem of electricity and magnetism interested him above all.
sentences.chinese: 電學和磁學的問題尤其使他感興趣。

sentences.english: The mechanical and electrical characteristics of Al(aluminum) nano-beams were presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對鋁納米梁進行了力學和電學特性測試。

sentences.english: The discovery that magnetism can produce electric current is extremely important in the field of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 磁能產生電流這一發現在電學中極爲重要。

sentences.english: The structure and electrical properties of silicon film after ZMR are studied.
sentences.chinese: 對區熔後的硅膜結構和電學性質進行了研究。

sentences.english: He mastered electrical engineering. Also he knew some elementary exercises for the piano.
sentences.chinese: 他精通電學工程，還知道一些基本的鋼琴練習。

sentences.english: Its thinness, too, gives it unusual electrical properties.
sentences.chinese: 它的薄也給了它不同尋常的電學特性。

sentences.english: Mr. Marshall was an electrician with elegant manners.
sentences.chinese: 馬歇爾先生是個有着優雅風度的電學家。

sentences.english: Child as he is , he knows something of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 他雖然還是個孩子，但他懂得一些電學知識。

sentences.english: Polarized light's electrical properties can reveal the presence and alignment of magnetic fields.
sentences.chinese: 偏振光的電學性能可以揭示磁場的存在及排列情況。

sentences.english: Child as he is, he knows something of electricity.
sentences.chinese: 雖然他還是個孩子，卻懂得一些電學知識。

sentences.english: The science of electrostatics is ancient, yet novel.
sentences.chinese: 靜電學這門科學是悠久的，但又是嶄新的。

sentences.english: The course of analog circuit is a specialized basic course of electrical engineering.
sentences.chinese: 模擬電路是電學工科學生的一門專業技術基礎課。

definition: (jocularly) public building that has been lying idle (and is thus ideal for housing mosquitos) (Tw)
abbr. of 資訊工程|资讯工程[zi1 xun4 gong1 cheng2]
